dayForecasts.forecast: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming sunny. Patchy fog in the morning. Highs in the 60s to upper 70s. West winds 5 to 10 mph increasing to 10 to 20 mph in the afternoon.
Clear in the evening then becoming mostly cloudy. Patchy fog after midnight. Lows in the 50s. West winds 10 to 20 mph decreasing to around 5 mph after midnight.
Mostly cloudy in the morning then becoming sunny. Patchy fog in the morning. Highs in the 70s to lower 80s. Northwest winds 5 to 15 mph.
Clear. Lows in the 50s. West winds 5 to 15 mph.
Sunny. Highs in the lower 70s to mid 80s. Northwest winds 5 to 15 mph.
Mostly clear. Lows in the mid 50s to lower 60s.
Mostly clear. Highs in the 70s to mid 80s. Lows in the mid 50s to lower 60s.
Mostly clear. Highs in the upper 60s to lower 80s. Lows in the mid 50s to lower 60s.
